knimeNode.name: Fingerprint From Set Bits list
knimeNode.shortDescription: Convert to a fingerprint column from a list of set bits

intro.p: This node converts to a fingerprint column from a column containing a list of set bits
This node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: The column containing the length of the fingerprint

option.name: Select the list of set bits column

fullDescription.option: A collection column containing long or integer cells listing the set bits
If true, the input columns are kept
The fingerprint type for the output

ports.inPort: Input table containing a list of lengths and set bits
